tweet: @repjohnlewis represents the best in our country. He’s never given up before, and if anyone can beat this, it’s John. Sending prayers to John and his family that he’ll soon be back making the #goodtrouble we need.

Paul fought to the end for reforms to the banking system that protect hardworking families. I am grateful for his guidance and wise counsel over the many meetings we had together.

Chairman Volcker stood out as a public servant who took financial stability and accountability seriously. His decades of experience were invaluable as our nation made much needed reforms to crack down on Wall Street’s risky bets that caused the 2008 Financial Crisis.
